person.persName: H.M. Stitt (Nicholas County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and post master.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and post master. Kentucky native. Married to Cinderella Fisher Still in Nicholas County, Kentucky on October 21, 1858. Father of Lizzie Lee Stitt. Laborer in Nicholas County, Kentucky in 1850. Postmaster in Carlisle, Kentucky in 1860. Co-owner of tavern and hotel Nicholas House in Nicholas County, Kentucky in 1863.
